title.rendered: Eagle Air Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Eagle Air is an Icelandic airline. It is based at Reykjavik Airport and offers domestic flights, charter services, and adventure tours in Iceland.Eagle Air was founded in 1970 by Hordur Gudmundsson and his family as a transportation and security link in the Westfjords, one of the most remote parts of Iceland. The airline’s initial focus was on ambulance and mail services. Propeller-driven aircraft operated by Eagle Air included the Helio Courier, Britten-Norman Islander, Piper Aztec, Piper Chieftain, Cessna Titan, de Havilland Canada DHC-6-300 Twin Otter, Cessna 206 and Cessna 185. Eagle Air also had a domestic charter flight component, which moved into the international arena in the early 1980s. Eagle Air flew charters to airports in Iceland, Greenland, Scandinavia and Europe.

Eagle Air Address : Head office
Reykjavik Airport

Phone : +354 562 4200

Email : info@eagleair.is

Bookings and Information

Phone : +354 562 2640

Eagle Air Official website : https://www.eagleair.is/home

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Eagle Air

  • British Aerospace Jetstream 32: TF-ORA, TF-ORC, TF-ORD and TF-ORG
  • Cessna 441 Conquest II: TF-ORF
  • Cessna 406 Caravan II
  • Cessna 207A Stationair 8: TF-ORB
  • Cessna 185 Skywagon: TF-ORN
  • Dornier 328: TF-ORI

Eagle Air Baggage Allowance

Eagle Air Baggage Allowance

View Eagle Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Eagle Air Special Assistance Services :

Travelling while pregnant in Eagle Air :

Expectant mother in their last month of pregnancy, must have medical approval for travel issued within 72 hours prior to commencement of travel.

For more details visit : https://www.eagleair.is/information/special-assistance#paragraph-15

Travelling with pet in Eagle Air :

For more details visit : https://www.eagleair.is/information/special-assistance#paragraph-12

Queries handled by Eagle Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Eagle Air Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Eagle Air : (click on the stars below)
